TopicTitle: Waiting for .24? Lets build a real spacecraft.

Articles.Content:
I realize this is somehow not a 'general' subject, but I wanted to put this here knowing there are many users on now twiddling their thumbs, that may not visit the forum often, and maybe some who do but never set foot in the Science lab.

There's a movement among us to send a satellite into Earth orbit In Real Life. We need your ideas, criticism, support and money.

Follow us. To Spaaaaaace! And check back from time to time to see where we go.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86010-KSP-Community-CubeSat

Edited July 15, 2014 by Aethon

Well, one, this doesn't go in General; you knew that. Bad Aethon!

And two, cross-posting isn't, strictly speaking, allowed. So... locking. Sorry.
